body:
Hey Guys, I am back, and no, I did not post that "Leaving Post" I was hacked, and it shouldn't happen again, I was able to switch my forums password. But because I'm back, here is a pvp montage of the first 3 nexus games I played today :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MkDUxD4A7oc&feature=youtu.be
 
And don't forget to ask me questions as it is a AMA as well :)
 
Have a great day! :)

title: I'm Baaackk!!!/AMA
